ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanitor Ship
ResearchProjectDef.description:
A ship built using ancient mechanitor technology. Serves as a vehicle between the surface and orbit, as well as between the moons of the planetary system. By recreating the technological solutions of the ancient civilization of mechanitors, the ship has a very high carrying capacity, decent speed, allows you to visit quite remote places, but consumes decent fuel, which is compensated by a capacious tank.
Passengers: 1 - 12 Speed: 30 Space Flight: Yes Tank capacity: 600L Fuel efficiency: 2.5 per cell Maximum distance: 360 cells Load capacity: 2000kg
